ygData.subject: Re: Black Silk Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: will sappers are in mistmoore castle i believe although this is from another source that someone told me about.  somebody confirm for me...they see invis and
ygData.messageBody:
will sappers are in mistmoore castle i believe although this is from
another source that someone told me about. somebody confirm for
me...they see invis and are quite nasty in general. They look like
really ugly hunched over women... i don't know what lvl but at 25 or so
(the last time i saw one) they were deep red to me...shortly after that
I quit hunting in Mistmoore...they usually come out with deathly
heralds and ushers and gypsies and are part of REALLY nasty trains hehe
the kinds that leave the zone littered with (and i do mean littered
with) most of the people that happen to be in mistmoore and get in
their way.

Crysarra
Chisarra
